recipe.title: Spicy Lentil Dip
recipe.ingredient: 1 can lentils drained or 1 1/2 cups cooked lentils
salt and pepper (to taste if desired)
recipe.step: Place all ingredients in a blender and whiz for about 5 mins or until mostly smooth.
Serve immediately with crackers and/or cut up veggies. Or store in fridge until required. This is seriously good despite its colour!
